definition: to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to stir-fry/to do the cooking/stir-fried dish
to stir-fry rapidly using a high flame/to conduct a media blitz/to manipulate a stock market through large-scale buying and selling
to stir-fry leftover rice/fig. to rehash the same story/to serve up the same old product

sentences.english: Fry shelled fresh shrimps additionally to also have similar effect with spadger egg according to the report.
sentences.chinese: 另據報道用麻雀蛋炒蝦仁也有類似功效。

sentences.english: Among them steaming and stir-fryingare more commonly applied to preserve the natural flavor.
sentences.chinese: 箇中蒸和炒最常用於保存天然風味。

sentences.english: Add balsam pear, saute with medium heat until done, serve.
sentences.chinese: 最後加入苦瓜，以中火再炒拌至所有材料熟透即可。

sentences.english: Sweet and Sour Pork with Steamed Rice and Asian Vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 青菜炒粗麪配蒸豬肉餃。

sentences.english: The roast beef and deviled crab are very good today.
sentences.chinese: 今天的烤生肉和炒辣味蟹都很好。

sentences.english: People like, to cook tomatoes with eggs.
sentences.chinese: 人們喜歡用雞蛋炒西紅柿。

sentences.english: The boss won’t bother scolding you if he wants to fire you.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“如果老闆要炒你魷魚，就不會費勁去責罵你。

sentences.english: The content of allantoin in Rhizoma Dioscoreae was determine by HPLC method.
sentences.chinese: 採用HPLC測定麩炒山藥中尿囊素的含量。

sentences.english: After the restaurant has fried all it can with the oil, Shenandoah has plans for it.
sentences.chinese: 餐廳後炒所有的，它可以與油，雪蘭計劃。

sentences.english: Fry the dried sweet potato leaves into iron boiler and pay attention to do not fry to burn.
sentences.chinese: 將乾燥後的紅薯葉放入鐵鍋中炒，注意不要炒糊焦。

sentences.english: Dry fry the cumin and coriander seeds, then grind them into a powder using a pestle and mortar.
sentences.chinese: 幹炒孜然和芫荽籽，然後用杵和臼磨成碎末。

sentences.english: This is what got me fired and then hired.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼我被炒掉了能夠又東山再起。

sentences.english: Cantonese cuisine, the hardest to categorize, emphasizes light cooking with seemingly limitless range of ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 最難歸類的粵菜強調輕炒淺煮，選料似乎不受限制。

sentences.english: I don't agree that she has to quit her job.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得你沒必要炒掉她。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effects of different preparative products of wheat bran on invigorating spleen.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察麥麩的健脾功效及不同炒製程度對其影響。

definition: to stir-fry rapidly using a high flame/to conduct a media blitz/to manipulate a stock market through large-scale buying and selling
to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)
to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
to evaporate/(of cooking) to steam/torch made from hemp stalks or bamboo (old)/finely chopped firewood (old)
